renewal.template: To renew your {policy_type} policy, please visit our renewal portal at example.com/renew or call us at 1-800-RENEWAL. Your current premium is {premium_amount}.
renewal.fallback: I can help with policy renewals. Which type of policy are you looking to renew (e.g., auto, home, life)?

claim.template: To file a claim for your {policy_type} policy, please go to example.com/claims or call our claims department at 1-800-CLAIMS. Please have your policy number ready.
claim.fallback: I can assist with filing a claim. What type of policy is this claim for?

payment.template: You can make a payment for your {policy_type} policy online at example.com/payments or by calling 1-800-PAYMENT. Your next payment of {premium_amount} is due soon.
payment.fallback: I can help with payments. What type of policy is this for, or what is the amount you need to pay?

quote.template: To get a quote for a new {policy_type} policy with {coverage} coverage, please visit example.com/quotes. We offer competitive rates!
quote.fallback: I can provide a quote for various policy types. What kind of insurance are you interested in (e.g., auto, home, life)?

complaint.template: We are sorry to hear you have a complaint. Please describe your issue in more detail, or visit example.com/complaints to submit a formal complaint.
complaint.fallback: I understand you have a complaint. Could you please provide more details so I can direct you to the right resource?
